headline.main: WORLD POLICE PLAN BACKED BY PUBLIC; 74% Favor an International Force After the War, a Gallup Poll Finds DIFFER WITH THE SENATE Striking Contrast Is Shown With Result of Survey by Associated Press Director American Institute of Public Opinion

lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N.J., May 1 -- A striking contrast between the views of the Senate and the views of the American people on one important post-war proposal is revealed today in a public opinion survey throughout the nation.
abstract: Gallup poll reveals US pub favors internatl police force establishment after war
snippet: PRINCETON, N.J., May 1 -- A striking contrast between the views of the Senate and the views of the American people on one important post-war proposal is revealed today in a public opinion survey throughout the nation....
